projects.title: DocuMate - A Document Analysis and Q&A Chatbot
projects.bodyText:
- Built a document analysis chatbot providing Q&A on any PDF document using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with the power of LLMs
 - Leveraged a range of technologies consisting of LangChain, OpenAI, Chroma DB, Flask, React.js, Bootstrap, and CSS, to ensure smooth and reliable performance for users

projects.title: Make Event Happen - Event Management Application
projects.bodyText:
- Constructed a web application for the Stevens community that enables users to create and manage events, and participate in forum discussions and one-on-one chats with event hosts, resulting in more community engagement
 - Employed a powerful technology stack consisting of React.js, Node.js, Redis, Socket.io, Python, Selenium, Heroku, and MongoDB Atlas to deliver a highly responsive and interactive experience

projects.title: Online Medical Consultation Application
projects.bodyText:
- Built a cutting-edge web application that enables patients to schedule appointments for both online video consultations and in-person visits with nearby doctors
 - Leveraged a range of advanced technologies, including Node.js, Express.js, Socket.io, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS, and MongoDB Atlas, to ensure smooth and reliable performance for users
